attributes.action: national service or community service for those on jobseekers or income support
attributes.additional_details: those on income support or jobseekers allowance that get paid from the goverment for doing nothing should be made to do volenteer work for there benefits, even if it's only 20 hours per week, that way you could substitute these people into public services improving the country and lowering crime as instead of being bored or getting drunk they would have a purpose, the goverment would also get a return on their investment in people. they could even allow people time off for interviews
